thread.title: NASCAR community celebrates 'Back to the Future' Day
thread.title_full: NASCAR community celebrates 'Back to the Future' Day

title: NASCAR community celebrates 'Back to the Future' Day
text:
Shake and Bake NASCAR Blog NASCAR community celebrates 'Back to the Future' Day To celebrate, many in the NASCAR community took to Twitter to remember this iconic date in movie history. By Josh Richter - Shake and Bake Crew Oct 21, 2015 at 12:30p ET 0Shares 
Happy "Back to the Future" Day! 
In the classic 1989 flick "Back to the Future II," Marty McFly and Doc Brown hop in their time-traveling DeLorean for a trip into the future ... all the way to Oct. 21, 2015. To celebrate, many in the NASCAR community -- from teams to tracks to sponsors -- took to Twitter to remember this iconic date in movie history. ‚Äî Hendrick Motorsports (@TeamHendrick) October 21, 2015 In honor of #BackToFutureDay check out this awesome Delorean that came out to #FridayNightDrags this summer! pic.twitter.com/Cq4obXXdtd ‚Äî Texas Motor Speedway (@TXMotorSpeedway) October 21, 2015 That time when Doc Brown's car stopped by at @SummitRacing Motorama! #BackToFutureDay pic.twitter.com/E2hE0TltOk ‚Äî Monster Mile (@MonsterMile) October 21, 2015 I was born in 1963 and thought in 2015 we would be driving flying cars? I was wrong BUT we have cell phonesüòÅüëç ‚Äî Kenny Wallace (@Kenny_Wallace) October 21, 2015 Kinda disappointed, waited my whole life for a pair of shoes with "Air laces" keep waiting I guess #BackToFutureDay ‚Äî Daniel Hemric (@DanielHemric) October 21, 2015 In honor of #BackToTheFuture Day, we're comparing Pocono photos from 1985 and 2015! Pocono Welcoming Committee pic.twitter.com/jfkQy9ZuPb ‚Äî Pocono Raceway (@poconoraceway) October 21, 2015 It was "Hip To Be a Square" in the 80's, but we've always been partial to triangles here! #BackToFutureDay pic.twitter.com/Ty82woAkAw ‚Äî Pocono Raceway (@poconoraceway) October 21, 2015 Forget plutonium and rotten banana peels. The DeLorean is now fueled by the Power of Love(‚Äôs)! #BackToTheFuture pic.twitter.com/ippd71iMc6 ‚Äî Love's Travel Stops (@LovesTravelStop) October 21, 2015 Car-care advice from Doc Brown. #BacktotheFutureDay pic.twitter.com/EaMBMqMQNe ‚Äî Interstate Batteries (@interstatebatts) October 21, 2015 0
